recommendations: Hardik Derashri ‚ÄúI highly recommend Aayushi based on her unwavering dedication and exceptional leadership during our time at AIESEC. Aayushi's commitment was evident as she devoted hours commuting daily, emphasizing her dedication and seriousness towards her role. Moreover, she wasn't solely focused on organizational goals but also took time to guide us individually. Personally, Aayushi helped me overcome my introversion by encouraging me to step out of my comfort zone, fostering new connections and friendships. Her personalized support towards our individual growth was invaluable. Furthermore, her adeptness and leadership shone during the pandemic. Aayushi swiftly pivoted our organization's operations to online platforms, ensuring seamless transitions. Her skillful leadership enabled us to conduct successful online events despite challenging circumstances. In conclusion, Aayushi is a dedicated leader who not only excels in her role but also invests in the personal growth of her team members. Her commitment and leadership skills significantly contributed to our organization's success.‚Äù

Sanskriti Patidar ‚ÄúIt's been a privilege collaborating with Aayushi for two years. Her exceptional leadership, proficiency in team management, strategic planning, design, and content creation set a remarkable standard. Aayushi's people-centric approach and creative prowess significantly contributed to our project successes. Her ability to navigate challenges with composure and deliver innovative solutions is truly commendable. Without hesitation, I highly recommend Aayushi as an invaluable asset to any team, confident in her continued success.‚Äù

volunteer_experience.info:
I am a former fellow at Gramiksha, a registered non-profit organization committed to providing an empowering childhood and equal opportunities to all children. Our focus is on enhancing the quality of education in government schools through innovative learning models that foster critical thinking, practical knowledge, and overall development.During my tenure, I actively contributed to two impactful projects: Udaan and SEED. Through Udaan, we worked on developing personal and social‚Ä¶
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          I am a former fellow at Gramiksha, a registered non-profit organization committed to providing an empowering childhood and equal opportunities to all children. Our focus is on enhancing the quality of education in government schools through innovative learning models that foster critical thinking, practical knowledge, and overall development.During my tenure, I actively contributed to two impactful projects: Udaan and SEED. Through Udaan, we worked on developing personal and social qualities among children while promoting extracurricular activities in government schools to supplement education and encourage holistic growth.With SEED, our goal was to bring about systemic transformation by changing mindsets and practices in the educational landscape. By promoting efficient school leadership and involving teachers, educational functionaries, parents, and communities, we aimed to improve school processes and culture, resulting in increased attendance, participation, and motivation among students, leading to improved educational outcomes.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
